thread.title: Apple TV supports 'Guitar Hero Live,' 'Disney Infinity' via Bluetooth
thread.title_full: Apple TV supports 'Guitar Hero Live,' 'Disney Infinity' via Bluetooth

title: Apple TV supports 'Guitar Hero Live,' 'Disney Infinity' via Bluetooth
text: Apple TV supports 'Guitar Hero Live,' 'Disney Infinity' via Bluetooth Wednesday, 9 September 2015 (10 minutes ago) Guitar Hero Live, Skylanders SuperChargers and Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions are on their way to Apple TV , iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch in the fall. Additionally, Disney Infinity 3.0 is heading to Apple TV by then end of the year. But that's the old n...
